trans-unit.source: Modify the DATA 0 settings on a StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Modify the DATA 0 settings on a StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to reconfigure the DATA 0 network interface on your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to reconfigure the DATA 0 network interface on your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Modify the DATA 0 network interface settings on your StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Modify the DATA 0 network interface settings on your StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device has six network interfaces, from DATA 0 to DATA 5.
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device has six network interfaces, from DATA 0 to DATA 5.

trans-unit.source: The DATA 0 interface is always configured through Windows PowerShell interface or the serial console, and is automatically cloud-enabled.
trans-unit.target: The DATA 0 interface is always configured through Windows PowerShell interface or the serial console, and is automatically cloud-enabled.

trans-unit.source: DATA 0 interface is first configured through setup wizard during the initial deployment of the StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: DATA 0 interface is first configured through setup wizard during the initial deployment of the StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: When the device is in an operational mode, you may need to reconfigure DATA 0 settings.
trans-unit.target: When the device is in an operational mode, you may need to reconfigure DATA 0 settings.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial provides two methods to modify DATA 0 network settings, both through Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial provides two methods to modify DATA 0 network settings, both through Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: After reading this tutorial, you will be able to:
trans-unit.target: After reading this tutorial, you will be able to:

trans-unit.source: Modify DATA 0 network setting through the setup wizard
trans-unit.target: Modify DATA 0 network setting through the setup wizard

trans-unit.source: Modify DATA 0 network settings through Set-HcsNetInterface cmdlet
trans-unit.target: Modify DATA 0 network settings through Set-HcsNetInterface cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Modify DATA 0 network settings through setup wizard
trans-unit.target: Modify DATA 0 network settings through setup wizard

trans-unit.source: You can reconfigure DATA 0 network settings by connecting to the Windows PowerShell interface of your StorSimple device and launching a setup wizard session.
trans-unit.target: You can reconfigure DATA 0 network settings by connecting to the Windows PowerShell interface of your StorSimple device and launching a setup wizard session.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to modify DATA 0 settings:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to modify DATA 0 settings:

trans-unit.source: To modify DATA 0 network settings through setup wizard
trans-unit.target: To modify DATA 0 network settings through setup wizard

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, Log in with full access.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, Log in with full access.

trans-unit.source: When prompted provide the device administrator password.
trans-unit.target: When prompted provide the device administrator password.

trans-unit.source: The default password is Password1.
trans-unit.target: The default password is Password1.

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, type:

trans-unit.source: Invoke-HcsSetupWizard
trans-unit.target: Invoke-HcsSetupWizard

trans-unit.source: A setup wizard will appear to help you configure the DATA 0 interface of your device.
trans-unit.target: A setup wizard will appear to help you configure the DATA 0 interface of your device.

trans-unit.source: Provide new values for the IP address, gateway, and netmask.
trans-unit.target: Provide new values for the IP address, gateway, and netmask.

trans-unit.source: The fixed controllers IPs will need to be reconfigured through the Configure page of the StorSimple device in the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: The fixed controllers IPs will need to be reconfigured through the Configure page of the StorSimple device in the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: For more information, go to <link><linkText>Modify network interfaces</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, go to <link><linkText>Modify network interfaces</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Modify DATA 0 network settings through Set-HcsNetInterface cmdlet
trans-unit.target: Modify DATA 0 network settings through Set-HcsNetInterface cmdlet

trans-unit.source: An alternate way to reconfigure DATA 0 network interface is through the use of the Set-HcsNetInterface cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: An alternate way to reconfigure DATA 0 network interface is through the use of the Set-HcsNetInterface cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is executed from the Windows PowerShell interface of your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: The cmdlet is executed from the Windows PowerShell interface of your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to modify the DATA 0 settings:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to modify the DATA 0 settings:

trans-unit.source: To modify DATA 0 network settings through the Set-HcsNetInterface cmdlet
trans-unit.target: To modify DATA 0 network settings through the Set-HcsNetInterface cmdlet

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, Log in with full access.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, Log in with full access.

trans-unit.source: When prompted provide the device administrator password.
trans-unit.target: When prompted provide the device administrator password.

trans-unit.source: The default password is Password1.
trans-unit.target: The default password is Password1.

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, type:

trans-unit.source: Set-HCSNetInterface -InterfaceAlias Data0 -IPv4Address <> -IPv4Netmask <> -IPv4Gateway <> -Controller0IPv4Address <> -Controller1IPv4Address <> -IsiScsiEnabled 1 -IsCloudEnabled 1
trans-unit.target: Set-HCSNetInterface -InterfaceAlias Data0 -IPv4Address <> -IPv4Netmask <> -IPv4Gateway <> -Controller0IPv4Address <> -Controller1IPv4Address <> -IsiScsiEnabled 1 -IsCloudEnabled 1

trans-unit.source: In the angled brackets, type the following values for DATA 0:
trans-unit.target: In the angled brackets, type the following values for DATA 0:

trans-unit.source: IPv4 address
trans-unit.target: IPv4 address

trans-unit.source: IPv4 gateway
trans-unit.target: IPv4 gateway

trans-unit.source: IPv4 subnet mask
trans-unit.target: IPv4 subnet mask

trans-unit.source: Fixed IPv4 address for Controller 0
trans-unit.target: Fixed IPv4 address for Controller 0

trans-unit.source: Fixed IPv4 address for Controller 1
trans-unit.target: Fixed IPv4 address for Controller 1

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: To configure network interfaces other than DATA 0, you can use the <link><linkText>Configure page in the Management Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To configure network interfaces other than DATA 0, you can use the <link><linkText>Configure page in the Management Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: If you experience any issues when configuring your network interfaces, refer to <link><linkText>Troubleshoot deployment issues</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you experience any issues when configuring your network interfaces, refer to <link><linkText>Troubleshoot deployment issues</linkText><title></title></link>.
